title: * Adam Schiff is a child molester: unfounded allegations circulated about a congressman
subtitle: The false allegations concerning the United States Republic of America (Adam Schiff) have been exaggerated to allegations that are grossly inaccurate.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The Republic of the United States (Adam Schiff) is a well-known homosexual who has settled several cases of sexual crimes outside the courthouse.
